Question & Options:

Options:
A. Jared Padalecki
B. Tom Welling
C. James Franco
D. Ryan Reynolds

Options:
A. A. Selma Blair
B. B. Naomi Watts
C. C. Jennifer Garner
D. D. Kate Beckinsale

A. Warner Bros.
B. Universal Pictures
C. StudioCanal
D. Columbia Pictures
